alert.note: Alert for Kennebec (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 4:33PM EST until December 21 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River At Skowhegan affecting Kennebec and Somerset Counties. Kennebec River At Augusta affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River At North Sidney affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River at Hallowell affecting Sagadahoc and Kennebec Counties. Carrabassett River At North Anson affecting Franklin and Somerset Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kennebec River at Augusta. * WHEN...Until early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Several businesses along Front Street in downtown Augusta suffer basement flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:18 PM EST Monday the stage was 10.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 23.3 feet late tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
